aka: Sofitel Gold Coast Broadbeach Hotel Broadbeach
description: The Sofitel Gold Coast Hotel is in Broadbeach, the most cosmopolitan location on the entire Gold Coast. Only fifty meters away from the beach, the hotel is no more than a short stroll to the Gold Coast Convention Centre. As an added attraction, this Sofitel is linked to Jupiter's Casino by monorail. There are 295 spacious guest rooms, each with its own balcony and a panoramic view, two pools, tennis courts and a spa.
